msbt.message: It's almost 's big day, !I can't wait. It's gonna be like leg day times a gajillion!
Tomorrow is 's big day, !Are you excited? I'm so pumped, I've been doing triple sets to burn off the energy.
You ready for the Fishing Tourney on Saturday, ?I've been doing super-secret weight training. Don't want my delts to give out holding a fishing rod.Shh! Don't tell anyone!
The Fishing Tourney starts tomorrow, !I can't wait to show off my training. It's gonna be epic, !
Hey, . All set for Saturday's Bug-Off?I've been working on my triceps for weeks. Those bugs won't know what caught 'em, !
Hey, ! The Bug-Off is tomorrow! You ready? 'Cause I am!I hope the bugs have been training as hard as I have. I want a challenge, !
Didja hear we're getting a fireworks show tomorrow? I'm pumped!When a big firework goes off in the sky, it feels like I just maxed out a new lift, .
You come up with your play for the Happy Home Academy yet? They're coming tomorrow, !They're gonna score how you've decorated your place, so you gotta put out your A game!
How was your Happy Home Academy score? Mine, umwell, there weren't any touchdowns, that's for sure.Plus, they never even asked how many crunches I can do
This year just sprinted by, didn't it? You ready for the end of ?There's gonna be a big bash on New Year's Eve. I still gotta figure out what to wear to show off my lats!
's ending TOMORROW! Are you pumped, ? You KNOW I am!They're gonna do the Countdown in the plaza tomorrow night. I'll see you there, !
Can't believe it's almost May 1st May Day's sprinting up super fast.Word is there's gonna be some kind of May Day event on another island. I'm hoping it's a pentathlon!

Tomorrow's May Day. You ready to find out what this island event thing's all about, ?I overheard something about us needing a May Day Ticket to go, but so far that's all I know.I'm so pumped. Tom Nook says he's not gonna give us the play-by-play till tomorrow, but I wanna know now!
